definition: rivers and lakes/all corners of the country/remote areas to which hermits retreat/section of society operating independently of mainstream society, out of reach of the law/the milieu in which wuxia tales play out (cf. 武俠|武侠[wu3 xia2])/(in late imperial times) world of traveling merchants, itinerant doctors, fortune tellers etc/demimonde/(in modern times) triads/secret gangster societies/underworld
(of a person) to return to the fray after a period of inactivity/to jump back into the thick of things/(of sth that was once popular) to be resurrected/to make a comeback
a much-travelled person, well acquainted with the ways of the world
to travel around the country (as itinerant peddler or entertainer)
to make a living as a traveling performer etc
to roam far and wide/to drift with the wind
you can't always do as you like/one has to compromise in this world (idiom)
pinyin: ren2 zai4 jiang1 hu2 , shen1 bu4 you2 ji3

definition: see 重出江湖 [chong2 chu1 jiang1 hu2]

sentences.english: For many years, he avoided lakes "ending."
sentences.chinese: 多年來，他迴避《笑傲江湖》的結局。

sentences.english: Chen Jiaying is Laojiang Hu that she would take hasty to Faye Wong in the stomach joke?
sentences.chinese: 陳家瑛是老江湖，她會草率到拿王菲的肚子開玩笑嗎？

sentences.english: In my mind in river"s lake, very easy."
Then did Big bro meet any girl out there?
sentences.chinese: 那大師兄有否在江湖上遇到什麼紅顏知己？

sentences.english: Farewell, each other, than forget themselves in the rivers and lakes.
sentences.chinese: 別了，相濡以沫，不如相忘於江湖。

sentences.english: Yangcheng Lake hairy crabs is famed as number one brand for Chinese hairy crabs many years.
sentences.chinese: 作爲中國大閘蟹第一品牌，陽澄湖多年來獨步江湖。

sentences.english: We will see the super soft compound in use again, how difficult will tyre management be?
sentences.chinese: 超軟光頭胎重出江湖，對於輪胎分配有什麼困難？

sentences.english: Rests in the ring, the rich can be the enemy, river's lake as the tomb of king.
sentences.chinese: 威名響四海，富甲可敵國，江湖稱其爲墓王派。

sentences.english: LaoJiangHu ghost uncle, is before the sword, is now home TiTouJiang descends to the porter.
sentences.chinese: 老江湖鬼叔，以前是刀家的門房，現已淪落爲剃頭匠。

sentences.english: If it quacks like a balloon…
sentences.chinese: 如果它像一個氣球江湖醫生。

sentences.english: It is sorcerers and charlatans who accept money for their spells and prayers.
sentences.chinese: 江湖術士纔會接受金錢去販賣他們的咒語和祈禱。

sentences.english: Small jia she borrow wood, injured advice he should return to the path from the rivers lake.
sentences.chinese: 小嘉便借木榮受傷之事，勸告他應重返正道退出江湖。

sentences.english: The charlatan boasted that he could charm off any disease.
sentences.chinese: 這個江湖騙子吹牛說他能用符咒治好各種疾病。

sentences.english: Another testimony that in Jianghu, everyone has an evil heart, and everywhere there are crouching tigers and hidden dragons.
sentences.chinese: 再一次證實了江湖上人心險惡，處處臥虎藏龍。

sentences.english: Hard-working medical men may come to be almost as mischievous as quacks .
sentences.chinese: 辛勤工作的醫生可能變成江湖郎中那樣的騙子。

sentences.english: The quack was stormed with questions .
sentences.chinese: 江湖騙子受到了猛烈的質問。

definition: to travel around the country (as itinerant peddler or entertainer)
martial arts chivalry (Chinese literary, theatrical and cinema genre)/knight-errant
to roam far and wide/to drift with the wind
marketplace/town/the street (urban milieu)/the haunts of the common people
to go back to one's native place and live in seclusion
Dugu Qiubai, a fictional character appearing in 金庸[Jin1 Yong1] novels
